body.name: Selfie Stick, Extendable Selfie Stick Tripod with Wireless Remote & Phone Holder, Portable Phone Tripod for Group Selfie/Live Streaming/Video Recording
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 8 mins
features: 【Upgraded Stable & Versatile Selfie Stick】Our upgraded selfie stick tripod features a reinforced base with a silicone non-slip foot pad for enhanced stability. It's the perfect combination of a selfie stick and a tripod, compatible with most smartphones in the market. Use it as a regular selfie stick or as a quick and easy tripod for shots.

【Selfie Stick Tripod With Wireless& Detachable Remote】2-in-1 selfie stick tripod with detachable wireless remote (max:33ft ) allows you take selfie-photography or you can detach the remote control to take group photos like parties, graduation, wedding, travel. You can use it as a regular selfie stick or as a quick and easy phone tripod. **Note**: Under tripod mode, the center of gravity for cellphone must be kept in line with the selfie stick.

【Adjustable & Rotatable Tripod and Selfie Stick】Equipped with 190°rotation head and 360°rotatable phone holder(support mobile phones up to 3.4" wide), you could rotate the phone clip and select horizontal or vertical camera mode to get the best angle photos. Simply twist the cradle head or phone holder to take photos, video call or live broadcasting. Easy application and precise positioning to expand the range of shots you can capture.

【Extendable Selfie Stick for Cell Phone】Our selfie stick tripod can be extended between 7.6 to 38.1 inches, making it suitable for photography, FaceTime, business, and more. It allows you to shoot various heights that other phone tripod mounts cannot shoot, capturing a wider field of view. Plus, it's compact and easy to carry around.

【Premium & Corrosion-Resistant】Our selfie stick tripod is made of premium stainless steel, making it lightweight and corrosion-resistant. It comes with a comfortable handle and is designed to be functional and durable. Package includes 1x selfie stick tripod, 1x wireless remote, and 1x user manual.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Stable Tripod Base The enlarged range of the base can strengthen the load-bearing capacity of the tripod, making it more stable and not easy to shake. The silicone foot pad at the bottom can increase friction and play a non-slip effect, allowing you to use it with confidence. Stainless Steel Telescopic Rod Stainless steel material makes it more durable against rust. This selfie stick tripod can be extended between 7.6 to 38.1 inches, provides more possibilities for taking pictures. Capturing a wider field of view, and satisfying your needs in different occasions. Universal Phone Holder The size of the phone holder can be adjusted in the range of 2.28-3.46in. Suitable with most cellphones. The inner side of the arm is equipped with a silicone pad to protect the mobile phone from scratches during installation.

Erligpowht Selfie stick tripod- Free your hands, enjoy your life! Built-in Tripod: 2 in 1 selfie stick tripod with detachable wireless remote, perfect for selfies or group photos. Lightweight: Compact design to take this selfie stick everywhere you go, make an ordinary selfie stick lighter but more functional. 360°Rotable Design: 190°rotation head with an adjustable knob + 360°rotatable phone holder, choose the best angle to take photos. Adjustable Holder: The max extension can up to 3.46 inch, works with most smartphones. Extendable Pole: This selfie stick tripod can be extended between 7.6 to 38.1 inches, which makes it very suitable for Photograph, Face-time, Business and more. Easy to set up,Easy to use: Step 1.Turn on the shutter by pressing the camera button on remote , it will enter into pairing mode and indicator LED flash quickly. Step 2. Active the function on your phone and sourcing the devices around. Step 3. Select the device of "Dispho" from the list and pairing will be finished automatically in few seconds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice selfie stick
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for our cruise, and it worked great. It was very easy to set up to my phone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well designed, stores easily
reviews.reviewText: Selfie Stick, Extendable Selfie Stick Tripod with Wireless Remote and Phone HolderMine is with me but not used most of the time, so size, weight matter.Excellent design, well suited to purpose: • light weight, and short length when folded means it fits securely in the water bottle pocket of a day pack. • Phone is secure in use. • Remote pairs easily and reliably. • Phone mount section, when folded, secures the detachable remote so it cannot bounce loose. • Extended, plenty long for a 2-4 person selfie. • With phone mounted, the tripod section forms a sturdy comfortable handle; I’ve used it collapsed as steadier than holding the phone in my hand.cons: • not as stable as a dedicated tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact and light weight, goes anywhere!
reviews.reviewText: It's very compact and light weight and can be carried anywhere. The remote connects to my iphone easily and works without problem. The tripod is a bit flimsy but works fine under normal condition. I bought it for my 10 day trip to the Canadian Rockies and am very glad I did. Just be careful that, like many other users indicated, it rolls a little at the handle when the stick is fully extended and weight (i.e., your phone) is added to the end. Otherwise it's a convenient gadget to carry around when travelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used for a long time and many times till it finally broke but happy with how long it lasted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I love this selfie stick tripod! It was so easy to set up and use. I wanted to take family Christmas photos in front of the tree and didn't have anyone to take them for us. I ordered this selfie stick and figured I would give it a shot. We used the tripod the whole Christmas season to take photos. The remote made taking pictures so easy because you did not have to set a timer on your phone and then run back to get in place to take the picture, you could discreetly press the button on the remote while holding my smile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good price, average quality, poor sturdiness
reviews.reviewText: I probably shouldn't be complaining for a price tag of $13 after coupon. The selfie stick works as expected. Bluetooth is easy to setup, connectivity is quick and stable. The tripod base is sufficiently wide to place it on a flat surface. The telescopic stick when fully extended is not sturdy at the top, the telescopic section one before the top most section rotates by about 10 degree making the phone tilt. May be my unit is defective, and hope the manufacturer reads this and offers a replacement.The remote control clicks in place, but it feels like it may fall off. Be careful to make sure it is properly put in place. Because of poor sturdiness, I have rated versatility as below average.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great! It stands, you can hold it, holds my iPhone 12 perfectly and the button make it so much easier to take pictures/video from a few feet away!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The worst selfie stick ever.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this selfie stick with high hopes. Being an avid traveler and someone who enjoys capturing moments, I thought this would be an ideal addition to my photography gear. But alas, this product is far from what I had envisioned.Firstly, the stick's construction is incredibly flimsy. It's an uncomfortable blend of cheap plastic and subpar metal components. The moment I took it out of the box, I knew it wouldn't last, and I was right. After only a week of light use, it began to wobble, making it impossible to capture steady photos or videos.The telescoping mechanism was another disappointment. Instead of smoothly extending, it jerked and resisted, and I felt like I was in a tug-of-war match with it. Not to mention, it would often jam halfway, leaving me with a selfie stick that was much shorter than promised.And then there's the phone holder. It's practically a phone destroyer. The clamping mechanism is overly tight and scratched the sides of my phone. Plus, it did not provide a secure hold. My phone, which isn't even a particularly large model, nearly fell out multiple times. The risk of damaging an expensive smartphone far outweighs the benefits of this shoddy product.The bluetooth remote, the supposed 'high point' of this product, was nothing more than a cruel joke. It refused to connect to my phone half of the time, and when it did, the lag between the button press and the actual photo being taken was exorbitantly long. I was left with a gallery full of poorly timed shots.Lastly, the customer service was terrible. When I contacted them about the issues I was experiencing, I was met with dismissive responses and a clear lack of understanding about their own product.Overall, I would not recommend this selfie stick to anyone. It's not just a waste of money, but also a risk to your valuable smartphone. A perfect example of 'you get what you pay for' – in this case, a heap of disappointment. It's clear that this product was designed with low costs in mind, not user experience or quality. Do yourself a favor and steer clear of this disastrous selfie stick.
